TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyChangedEventManager extends System.Windows.WeakEventManager

summary.span: 提供 实现，以便可以使用“弱事件侦听器”模式附加 事件的侦听器。

span.span: Provides a implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在此模式中的侦听器，侦听器对象必须实现。In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement . 不需要实现的源的事件的类。You do not need to implement on the class that is the source of the events.

summary.span: 添加指定的事件处理程序，当指定的源为指定的属性引发 事件时进行调用。

span.span: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the event for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法指定要用来订阅 事件的事件处理程序。Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the event.. 在使用此方法时，您的侦听器对象不需要实现 接口。When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the interface.

param.span: 要在其上开始侦听 的对象。

span.span: The object on which to start listening for .

summary.span: 开始侦听提供的源上的 事件。

span.span: Begins listening for the event on the provided source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这并不指定属性;事件管理器启动后，源上的所有属性都将都具有启用通知。This does not specify a property; once the event manager is started, all properties on the source will have notification enabled.
